short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy to use URL query string parameter parser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Validating whether campaign tracking parameters are set correctly is quickly done with the Accutics URL Parser. The extension provides a clean and quick overview of all query parameters present in the current URL. 

Additionally a custom URL can be used and parsed for visibility.
